article.headline: UC Irvine 85, Pepperdine 83 (2OT)
article.story: IRVINE, Calif. (AP) -- Stanislav Zuzak scored 20 points and made three free throws in the final 1:19 to give UC Irvine an 85-83 double overtime victory over Pepperdine Thursday. A pair of Zuzak free throws gave UC Irvine an 84-81 lead with 1:19 left in the second overtime. Alex Acker made two free throws for the Waves to close the UC Irvine lead to 84-83 with 45 seconds remaining. Pepperdine then forced a turnover but failed to convert. Zuzak was fouled and made one of two free throws with 10.4 seconds left to give the Anteaters an 85-83 lead. Terrance Johnson missed a dunk after rebounding a missed Pepperdine shot as time ran out. Adam Parada led UC Irvine (5-3) with 21 points and four blocked shots. Jeff Gloger added 14 points and 11 rebounds. Acker scored a career-high 32 points for Pepperdine (3-6). Johnson added 14. Keith Jarbo made a short jumper for Pepperdine with 33 seconds left in the first overtime that tied the game at 76-76 and forced a second overtime. Acker's running 10-foot jumper with 1.8 seconds remaining in regulation tied the game at 68-68, forcing the first overtime.
